sect1.title: PSX_OpenId_Store_Sql
sect1.para:
PSX_OpenId_Store_Sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `amun_system_assoc` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `opEndpoint` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `assocHandle` varchar(512) NOT NULL, `assocType` enum('HMAC-SHA1','HMAC-SHA256') NOT NULL, `sessionType` enum('DH-SHA1','DH-SHA256') NOT NULL, `secret` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `expires` int(10) NOT NULL, `date` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
